relation: Healthcare Facility places order with intermediary (e.g. McKesson, AmeriSource Bergen and Cardinal Health)
ScripsAmerica receives purchase order from intermediary
ScripsAmerica commissions packaging distributor to coordinate all activities
Packaging distributor orders bulk materials from manufacturer
Packaging distributor packages product to order specifications
Packaging distributor distributes product to intermediary
Upon receipt of product, intermediary issues proof of delivery to ScripsAmerica
Intermediary delivers product to healthcare facility
textBeforeTable: The registrant hereby amends this registration statement on such date or dates as may be necessary to delay its effective date until the registrant shall file a further amendment which specifically states that this registration statement shall thereafter become effective in accordance with section 8(a) of the securities act of 1933 or until the registration statement shall become effective on such date as the commission, acting pursuant to said section 8(a), may determine.    (2) The offering price has been estimated solely for the purpose of computing the amount of the registration
